title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 625
Gazette date 30th July, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 69 of 2021
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2021
In exercise of the powers contained in section 3 of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is issued:
1. (1) This Notice May be Cited as the Public Holidays Titie
(Declaration) Notice, 2021. CcmmaxEitHt
(2) This Notice is deemed to have come into operation on 1st
July, 2021
2. It is declared that Friday, 2nd July, 2021 and Wedneday, Declaration
7th July, 2021 shall be observed as Public Holiday in view of the of Public
Holiday
State Funeral and Burial of the First Republican President, Dr
Kenneth David Kaunda
Edgar C. Lungu,
Lusaka President
23rd July, 2021
[co. 101/9/1]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
626 Statutory Instruments 30th July, 2021
